unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my Mumbai University exams. My anxiety was sky-high. A friend suggested a meditation app. At first, I was skeptical, like something out of a Karan Johar movie. But honestly, practicing mindfulness 10 minutes a day helped calm my racing thoughts. It wasn't a cure-all, but a helpful tool.
